name: Sapce Survival 2 (Adapter 229)
description:
You were flying your spaceship in the space, when you received an S.O.S signal from a cargo. You went there, and entered the ship to rescue them. But there were something wrong happening. You turn around to your ship, but corridor was blocked. Now your only chance to survive is to reach the escape pod at the end of the ship.

This is a minigame made in Adapter language, for tutorial purposes.

Discover Adapter at spacespacesoftware.com
